mismatches.label: Number of Past Due Small Business Loans
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity represents a financial performance metric related to loan portfolio quality, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. ESG metrics would include items like carbon emissions, diversity statistics, board composition, or sustainability practices.

mismatches.label: Amount of Past Due Small Business Loans
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes a financial accounting metric related to loan portfolio quality, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. It lacks any connection to ESG topics such as environmental impact, social responsibility, or governance practices.

mismatches.label: Interconnectedness Category Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity represents a financial regulatory metric (G-SIB interconnectedness score) used for systemically important bank classification, not an ESG disclosure metric. It does not relate to environmental, social, or governance disclosures as defined in the Metric type definition.

mismatches.label: Substitutability Category Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes a G-SIB (Global Systemically Important Bank) substitutability score, which is a financial regulatory metric, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. The entity type definition specifically requires ESG-related disclosures.

mismatches.label: Complexity Category Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity represents a financial regulatory metric (G-SIB complexity score) rather than an ESG disclosure. It does not relate to environmental, social, or governance sustainability reporting as defined in the Metric type definition.

mismatches.label: Cross-Jurisdictional Activity Category Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity represents a financial regulatory metric (G-SIB scoring) used for systemically important bank classification, not an ESG disclosure metric. It does not relate to environmental, social, or governance disclosures as defined in the Metric type definition.

mismatches.label: Checking and Savings Accounts
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This describes financial product metrics (checking/savings accounts) segmented by customer type, which are standard banking business metrics. It does not represent ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosures or sustainability-related metrics as required by the definition.

mismatches.label: Loans by Segment
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This entity describes general business/financial metrics about loan portfolio composition, not ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosures. The definition specifically requires ESG-related quantitative metrics or qualitative disclosure requirements, which loan segmentation data does not represent.

mismatches.label: G-SIB Interconnectedness Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: While this is a quantitative metric with a score, it relates to banking regulatory requirements (Global Systemically Important Bank indicators) rather than ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosures. The G-SIB framework is a financial stability measure, not an ESG metric.

mismatches.label: G-SIB Substitutability Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: This is a financial regulatory metric related to Global Systemically Important Banks (G-SIB) classification, not an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. It does not match the definition requiring ESG-related quantitative or qualitative disclosures.

mismatches.label: G-SIB Complexity Score
mismatches.llm_reasoning: While this is a quantitative metric with a score, it is a financial regulatory metric (Global Systemically Important Bank complexity indicator) rather than an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric as required by the definition.

entities.label: Percentage of Gross Exposure in Financed Emissions

properties.description: Percentage of gross exposure included in the financed emissions calculation. If less than 100%, entity shall disclose information explaining exclusions, including the type of assets excluded.
